mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food_machine ( id, imei, host, area_code, pos, notice, cat_id, partner_id, status, replenish_man, picking_man, maintenance_man,remark, create_time,create_by, update_time, update_by) VALUES ( #{id}, #{imei}, #{host}, #{areaCode}, #{pos}, #{notice}, #{catId}, #{partnerId}, #{status}, #{replenishMan},#{pickingMan},#{maintenanceMan},#{remark}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy});
mapper.select: select mac.area_code,mac.IMEI,mac.pos, mac.`status`,mac.id, mac.address, mac_activity.activity_type from food_machine as mac left join food_machine_activity_ref as mac_activity on mac_activity.mac_id = mac.id where mac.area_code = #{areaCode}

SELECT mac.area_code, mac.IMEI, mac.pos, mac.`status`, mac.id, mac.address, mac_activity.activity_type, product_cat.icon, product_cat.id as cat_id, product_cat.`name` as cat_name FROM food_machine AS mac LEFT JOIN food_machine_activity_ref AS mac_activity ON mac_activity.mac_id = mac.id LEFT JOIN food_machine_product_cat as product_cat on product_cat.mac_id = mac.id WHERE mac.id = #{macId}
